official_title: A bill to make available for health and other humanitarian service to the needy a surplus vessel of the United States.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation, upon application, to provide a suitable vessel to Hospital Oceanic, a nonprofit organization founded for the operation of a hospital ship to serve countries on the west coast of Central and South America and in the Far East. Requires such vessel to be operated as a charitable vessel engaged in providing humanitarian services to the needy.

titles.title: A bill to make available for health and other humanitarian service to the needy a surplus vessel of the United States.
